honors_and_awards.title: MBA Leaders Scholarship in Value Investing
honors_and_awards.publication: Ben Graham Center of Value Investing, Ivey Business School
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded annually based on academic achievement and demonstrated community leadership. The recipient will have demonstrated a strong interest in Value Investing and the intention to enroll in the MBA course in Value Investing at Ivey

honors_and_awards.title: Richard Ivey Excellence Award
honors_and_awards.description: The Richard Ivey Excellence Award is presented to an outstanding incoming candidate to the Ivey MBA Program, recognizing academic achievement and leadership potential.

honors_and_awards.title: Scotiabank MBA Leaders Scholarship
honors_and_awards.description: The Scotiabank MBA Leaders Scholarship is annually presented to a student entering the MBA program at the Ivey Business School, based on academic performance and community involvement. The successful candidate will exhibit evidence of character, energy and leadership potential. This award is made possible through the generosity of Scotiabank.
